mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_logs (user_id, snapshot_name, snapshot_phone, snapshot_role, login_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{role}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE login_logs SET logout_at = NOW() WHERE log_id = ( SELECT t.log_id FROM ( SELECT l.log_id FROM login_logs l JOIN users u ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE u.user_email = #{email} AND l.logout_at IS NULL ORDER BY l.login_at DESC LIMIT 1 ) t )
